scenes.description: [Monica] says, 'Since you're focusing on the report, can you also draft the email to the client?'

options.text: Sure, I'll draft the email. Just let me know the key points.
options.analysis: You show good social skills and self-regulation, but your motivation could be higher for task completion.

options.text: I can draft the email, but I'll need some input from both of you to make sure it's accurate.
options.analysis: You balance social skills and emotional perception well, but empathy might be seen as lacking by not fully taking on the task independently.

options.text: I think it would be better if one of you drafts the email while I focus on the report.
options.analysis: You show strong self-regulation and social skills, but your emotional perception is lower as you shift the task priorities.
